dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5134 IH: To extend the National Advisory Committee on Institutional Quality and Integrity and the Advisory Committee on Student Financial Assistance for one year.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Foxx (for herself and Mr. Hinojosa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To extend the National Advisory Committee on Institutional Quality and Integrity and the Advisory Committee on Student Financial Assistance for one year.

section.header: Extension of National Advisory Committee on Institutional Quality and Integrity
section.text: Section 114(f) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1011c(f)) is amended by striking 2014 and inserting 2015.

section.header: Extension of Advisory Committee on Student Financial Assistance
section.text: Section 491(k) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1098(k)) is amended by striking 2014 and inserting 2015.
